text: The Learjet 55 "Longhorn" is an American-French business jet manufactured by Learjet. ==Specifications== ==Accidents and Incidents== * On 31 January 2025, a Mexican-registered Learjet 55 operating as a air ambulance by a Scottsdale, Arizona-based Jet Rescue Air Ambulance with six people on board crashed near Roosevelt Mall in Philadelphia. == References ==
title: Learjet 55
